rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: The entrance is designed to be inviting and adheres to Vastu principles with a north-facing entry, ensuring positive energy. The lobby area features natural light through large windows.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious area combining the living room, dining space, and adjacent kitchen. Emphasizes natural light and ventilation with large windows and skylights.

rooms.name: Contemporary Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is integrated into the open plan, featuring modern appliances and ample storage. The design ensures efficient workflow with plenty of natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with a private balcony, ensuring privacy while enjoying natural light and garden views.

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.description: An additional guest room with a small study area for convenience, designed to maximize light and air circulation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is spacious with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet. It is designed to maximize natural light through large windows.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: A luxury bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with ample ventilation and natural lighting.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main entrance is located on the north side of the building in accordance with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow and optimal natural light.

openings.name: Garden Access Door
openings.description: A door providing access to the large garden for relaxation and leisure.
